CREATE TABLE citation ( doi text NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, original_download_doi text, citation text NOT NULL, title text NOT NULL, target text NOT NULL, registration_date timestamp with time zone, created timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), created_by text NOT NULL, modified timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), modified_by text NOT NUll );
CREATE TABLE dataset_citation ( dataset_key uuid NOT NULL REFERENCES dataset(key) ON DELETE CASCADE, dataset_doi text, record_count integer, citation_doi text NOT NULL REFERENCES citation(doi) ON DELETE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (dataset_key, citation_doi) );
